songs.title: Kush
songs.lyrics:
(Intro)
Mary Jane flo…
Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo…
Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Dat kush, dat dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
I know dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush
Mary Jane’s flowers

(Verse)
I don’t smoke no Reggie, I don’t smoke no mediate
I’m always fuckin high
So much we might have kids
And why you babysittin the blunt?
That’s that shit I don’t like
I’m lookin for one of these bad bitches to come ride me like a turn pike
On some real shit, I’m a pot head
Please don’t blow my high mane
Look into my eyes and it look like I’m from Thailand
I am smoking on that gas
Life should be on Cinemax
Smoking on that OG in that double R, I’m real relaxed
I smoke so much good they call me killer
And I’m on that strong, I’m on that strong, body builder
Light that shit and pass it, my white girl on the acid
But me, I’m on da kush, dat kush
Tunechi

(Hook)
Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush
Mary Jane’s flowers

(Verse)
That little baller eat bubble bouquet
And by the look at my paint
Man it’s a wonderful spray
Sucka tryna fuck my high up on a sucka for yay
I told that sucka park yo whip cuz this a sucka-free lane
Haley hoop a Husssein, kickass weed, Wu-Tang
B’s for big on the Bentley
Can’t squeeze through lanes
Raw papers in Jamaica, eat some aky roller aye
But I be hippie blips, trippy sticks
Activate the vapors
And this anthrax wax, give you asthma attacks
I’m a smoker, you’s a joker, go on and pass that back
Lightning weed – that’s my dope style
Eyes lower than my profile
This’ll hit yo lung, you’ll cough both out

(Hook)
Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush
Mary Jane’s flowers

Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers

(Verse)
Huh! Kushin and swishin, it couldn’t be sweeter
I’m talkin P80 mine, the TAC off the meter
I spark up mark in the theater, clouds so thick
Heavy on real estate, house yo bitch
Black ballin for boss, I’m burnin like Biggie
Bob Marley and Ziggy, my niggas we run this city
It’s a very thin line, you can candy paint mine
All I want is Chevys and the best I could find
60 in the bank, another hundred on my mind
When we started out with Reggie we were barely getting dimes
We were barely getting dimes
Now all we fuck is dimes

(Hook)
Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Mane I got a big bouquet of Mary Jane’s flowers
Mary Jane flo… Mary Mary Jane’s flowers
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
Dat kush, dat kush
Mary Jane’s flowers

Nothing but dat kush
Nothing but dat kush
We ain’t smoking nothing but dat kush
I’ll pass it if it ain’t dat kush, dat kush, dat kush
